scripts.test-pw-regular: docker rm --force ghost-testing; npx playwright test --project=regular --workers 1
scripts.test-pw-regular-windows: docker rm --force ghost-testing & npx playwright test --project=regular --workers 1
scripts.data-validation: docker rm --force ghost-testing; npx playwright test --project=data --workers 1
scripts.vrt-base: CI=1 GHOST_VRT=1 GHOST_VERSION=4.5 npx playwright test --project=regular
scripts.vrt-old: CI=1 GHOST_VRT=1 GHOST_VERSION=5.96.0 npx playwright test --project=regular
scripts.vrt: npm run vrt-base && npm run vrt-old
